system.description:
You are both resolute and clever—a dangerous combination if ever there was one. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Dexterity, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Choose one of the following two options:
    • Savvy: You gain proficiency with Culture or an expertise die if you are already proficient. You also gain the etiquette and courtly manner skill specialties for the Culture skill; they do not count against your skill specialties known.
    • Subtle: You gain proficiency with the Deception skill or an expertise die if you are already present. You also gain the ciphers and concealing emotions skill specialties for the Deception skill; they do not count against your skill specialties known.
  • When you deal both @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.c6aiq8cd90fo3ry1]{Divine Smite} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.4727pnvz5nwn3h23]{Sneak Attack} damage to a target, you may choose to have the bonus damage from Sneak Attack match the type of damage dealt by your Divine Smite.
  • You can deal Sneak Attack damage with any weapon that lacks the two-handed and/or heavy properties.
  • You gain proficiency with your choice of the Viper’s Fangs or Sanctified Steel combat tradition and learn a maneuver of a degree you can learn from it. It does not count against your maneuvers known.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in herald, 3 levels in rogue
